member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsWholeWord(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text contains the given word.
This check will ignore the case.
判断指定文本是否包含给定的单词（word），此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsAnyWholeWord(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text contains any given word.
This check will ignore case.
判断指定文本是否包含给定的任意一个单词（word）。此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsWholePhrase(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text completely contains a given phrase (a phrase can contain several words and non-letter content).
This check will ignore case.
判断指定文本是否完整包含给定的一个短语（短语可以包含若干个单词和非字母内容）。此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsWholePhraseAny(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text completely contains any given phrase (phrase can contain several words and non-letter content).
This check will ignore case.
判断指定文本是否完整包含给定的任意一个短语（短语可以包含若干个单词和非字母内容）。此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsWholePhraseAll(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text completely contains all the given phrases (phrases can contain several words and non-letter content).
This check will ignore case.
判断指定文本是否完整包含给定的所有短语（短语可以包含若干个单词和非字母内容）。此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsIgnoreCase(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text contains the given text.
This check will ignore case.
判断指定文本是否包含给定的文本，此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsAnyIgnoreCase(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text contains any given text.
This check will ignore the case.
判断指定文本是否包含给定的任意一个文本，此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsAllIgnoreCase(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Determine whether the specified text contains all given texts.
This check will ignore the case.
判断指定文本是否包含给定的所有文本，此次检查将忽略大小写。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.ContainsOnlyThisChar(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary:
Determine whether there are only given characters in the specified text.
判断指定文本内是否只存在给定的字符。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.FindFirstPhrase(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Find and retrieve the first phrase that meets the requirements from the specified text.
从指定文本中查找第一个满足要求的短语。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.FindAndInsertBeforeFirstOccurrence(System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Find and insert before first occurrence

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.JoinStringFor``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
Combine the given set with a specific string as the delimiter.
将给定的集合以特定的字符串为分隔符进行合并。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.Split(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Cut the string according to the given separator.
根据给定的分隔符号对字符串进行切割。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitInWords(System.String)
member.summary:
Split on all non-word characters, and returns an array of all the words.
拆分所有非单词字符，并返回所有单词的数组。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitInWordsLongerThan(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Split on all non-word characters, and returns an array of all the words greater than the specified length.
拆分所有非单词字符，并返回所有大于指定长度的单词的数组。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitInLines(System.String)
member.summary:
Split text line by line.
逐行分割文本。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitInLinesTyped``1(System.String)
member.summary:
Split the text line by line, and convert the resulting character array into instance data of the specified type.
逐行分割文本， 并将分割所得的字符数组转换为指定类型的实例数据。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitInLinesWithoutEmpty(System.String)
member.summary:
Split the text line by line and remove blank lines.
逐行分割文本，并移除空行。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitByIndex(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Split the specified text according to the given index position, and return the two parts of the characters obtained as a tuple.
将指定文本根据给定的索引位置进行分割， 并将分割所得的两部分字符以元组形式返回。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitWordsByIndex(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
The specified text is divided into words according to the given index position, and the two parts of characters obtained from the division are returned in the form of tuples.
将指定文本根据给定的索引位置按单词（word）进行分割， 并将分割所得的两部分字符以元组形式返回。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitTyped``1(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary:
Split the specified text according to the given delimiter, and convert the resulting character array into instance data of the specified type.
将指定文本根据给定的分隔符进行分割，并将分割所得的字符数组转换为指定类型的实例数据。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SplitTyped``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Split the specified text according to the given delimiter, and convert the resulting character array into instance data of the specified type.
将指定文本根据给定的分隔符进行分割，并将分割所得的字符数组转换为指定类型的实例数据。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.TotalWords(System.String)
member.summary:
Count the total number of words.
统计总单词数。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.LastWord(System.String)
member.summary:
Get the last word from the given text.
从给定的本文中获得最后一个单词。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.SecondWord(System.String)
member.summary:
Get the first word from the given text.
从给定的本文中获得第二个单词。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.FirstWord(System.String)
member.summary:
Get the first word from the given text.
从给定的本文中获得第一个单词。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.IndexOfWord(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Get the word at the specified position from the given text.
Find positive numbers from front to back,
and negative numbers from back to front.
从给定的本文中获得指定位置的单词。正数从前往后找，负数从后往前找。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Text.CosmosStringExtensions.IsSameWord(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Determine that the specified text has exactly the same words as the given text.
Note that the order between words will be ignored.
判断指定的文本与给定的文本具有完全相同的单词。
注意，单词之间的顺序将被忽略。
